summary.para: Rearranges blocks of spatial data into depth. The operator outputs a copy of the input tensor where values from the height and width dimensions are moved to the depth dimension.
This is the inverse transformation of .

remarks.para: A newer version of this operator, , was introduced in DML_FEATURE_LEVEL_2_1.

summary.para: The tensor to read from. The input tensor's dimensions are { Batch, Channels, Height, Width }.
The tensor to write the results to. The output tensor's dimensions are { Batch, Channels / (BlockSize * BlockSize), Height * BlockSize, Width * BlockSize }.
The width and height of the Blocks that are moved.
